Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕਿਤੇ ਸੂਰਮੇ (ਯੁੱਧ ਵਿਚ) ਜੁਟੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The arrows are being discharged, the warriors are fighting, the limbs are being split and the war is continuing.256.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕਿਤੇ ਸੂਰਮੇ (ਕ੍ਰੋਧ ਨਾਲ) ਮਚੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors are getting excited, the heavenly damsels are roaming and the sparks of fire coming out of the colliding swords.257.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਅਤੇ ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਵਿਚ) ਅੱਗ (ਦੀਆਂ ਚਿਣਗਾ) ਨਿਕਲਦੀਆਂ ਹਨ ॥੨੫੭॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The limbs are being splitted, all are absorbed in the war, the horses are dancing and the warriors are thundering.258.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਦੂਜਿਆਂ ਦੇ ਘਾਉਆਂ ਨੂੰ) ਚਾਉ ਨਾਲ ਝਲਦੇ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The blows are being endured with pleasure, the warriors are falling down while swinging and thundering.259.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ (ਘਾਇਲ ਹੋ ਕੇ) ਝੂਮਦੇ ਹੋਏ ਨਿਉਾਂਦੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੫੯॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Contacting the numberless spirits, the warriors are lamenting, they are getting unconscious and falling down, the ghosts are dancing.260.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕਿਤੇ ਬਾਣਾ ਦੀ ਬਰਖਾ ਕਰਦੇ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors are fighting catching hold of arrows, the beauty is resplendent on all the faces and the heavenly damsels are looking at the warriors.261.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਨੂੰ) ਹੂਰਾ (ਵਰਨ ਲਈ) ਤਕ ਰਹੀਆਂ ਹਨ ॥੨੬੧॥
ਕਿਤੇ ਹਾਥੀਆਂ ਉਤੇ ਚੜ੍ਰਹ ਕੇ ਜੂਝਦੇ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors are fighting with the elephants after killing the enemies, they are running away after being hit by the arrows.262.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕਿਤੇ ਕ੍ਰੋਧ ਨਾਲ ਰਜੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors are lying down unconscious and in their fury, their hair have been loosened and their attires have been damaged.263.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕਿਤੇ ਹਾਥੀ ਉਤੇ ਚੜ੍ਰਹ ਕੇ ਲੜਦੇ ਹਨ,
(ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਦੇ) ਸਾਥੀ ਲੜ ਕੇ ਮਰ ਗਏ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The worriers have been destroyed while fighting with the elephants, the horses are roaming openly and the worriers are thundering. 264.
The heavenly damsels are roaming over the whole earth, on being hit by the arrows the warriors are embracing martyrdom.265.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਚਾਰੇ ਦਿਸ਼ਾਵਾ (ਤੀਰਾ ਨਾਲ) ਰੁਕ ਗਈਆਂ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: With the discharge of the arrows the directions have been hidden from view and the swords are gleaming high up in the sky.266.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਮਾਨੋ) ਆਕਾਸ਼ ਵਿਚ (ਬਿਜਲੀ) ਜਲਦੀ ਨਾਲ ਚਮਕ ਰਹੀ ਹੋਵੇ ॥੨੬੬॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The ghosts, arising from the graves, are coming towards the battlefield, the warriors are thundering and the horses are running.267.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਘੋੜਿਆਂ ਨੂੰ ਅਗੇ ਵਲ ਪ੍ਰੇਰ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੬੭॥
ਕਿਤੇ ਅੰਗ ਕਟੇ ਜਾ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors whose limbs have been chopped, are falling in the war arena and the intoxicated warriors are being killed.268.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਯੋਧੇ (ਇਕ ਦੂਜੇ ਨਾਲ ਜੰਗ ਵਿਚ) ਉਲਝੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ ॥੨੬੮॥
ਚਾਰੇ ਚਕ ਹੈਰਾਨ ਹੋ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The cries of “kill, kill” are being heard in all the four directions, the warriors are closing in and are not backing out.269.
They are striking blows with their lances, while shouting, the whiskers of those egoists are also charming.270.
The drums are being played and the warriors are shouting, the trumpets are sounding and the persistent warriors are fighting with one another.271.
The warriors are thundering, the horses are jumping, the arrows are being discharged and the fighters are going astray in the multitude.272.
